title: Pixel 3 not holding charge
content:
My Pixel 3 is refusing to hold a charge for long enough to get through the day.

In addition, my Pixel Stand will no longer rapid charge.

Is this an issue with the latest update? I installed it Friday and this only started Sunday or Monday for me.

Is there anyway I can actually talk to someone in support for Google? Can anyone link a direct phone number or email address or something?
